title: pAhimAm shrI harihara
sahitya:
pAhimAm shrI harihara bAlA vAhinI taTavara vaTuvESA


anupallavi

  mOhinI putra mOhana rUpa dEhi mE tava pAda darshana siddhim


caraNam    rAjakumArA rajata girIshA rAjita vyAghra gaNa parivAra
shrI shikhA vAhaka bhaktajana priya gajamukha SaNmukha sOdara sundara
